Articles.Content:
I'm from the US and was recommended this game by several friends. It's very rare to find a game that's not only fun to play, but also has educational value. Kerbal space program, and it's excellent mod support, more than make an educational game fun. I love it and look forward to the continued developments! I only have Demo version right now, but I hope to get the full version soon. My interest in space travel has been accelerated ever since the Alcubierre drive was announced as viable in 2012, and this program has only continued to increase my interest.

Warp Speed Ahead, fellow Kerbals!

Welcome to the forums! If you like the demo version, you'll love the full game Loads more stuff to blow up, crash into planets and send on escape vectors from the Kerbol SOI. Granted, Jeb's more into Orion drives than Alcubierre drives, but you can achieve anything with enough SRBs! Warp Speed Ahead indeed, but watch out for the Kraken
